attributes.action: Stop the flagrant discrimination of white english people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Discrimination is bad, or so we have been told for the last 30 years, If a job or position is available it should go to the person who is most suited to that job, regardless of race, gender, religous views, age etc. So stop this so called "Positive Discrimination" where anyone but white english can apply. How is this fair? This has been happening for some time in the building trade but now i read it in job centres and newspapers with regards to public sector work, what is going on????? This loophole must be closed so ANYONE can apply.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
